semantics.label: Video sources
semantics.description: To ensure that the video works in all browsers you should add both WebM and MP4 formatted sources.

fields.label: Fit video player to use all available space
fields.description: If not set the video player will have the same aspect ratio as the video.

fields.label: Show video player controls
fields.description: Add controls to the video player. This allows users to play, pause, etc.

fields.label: Auto-play video
fields.description: Start playing the video automatically. May not work on mobile devices.

fields.label: Loop video
fields.description: Automatically start the video over again when it ends.

fields.label: Name
fields.description: Helps identify content of this type.

fields.label: Loading
fields.default: កម្មវិធីលេងវីដេអូកំពុងដំណើរការ...

fields.label: No players found
fields.default: រកមិនឃើញកម្មវិធីដែលអាចលេងប្រភេទវីដេអូដែលបានបញ្ចូល។

fields.label: No sources
fields.default: មិនមានឯកសារវីដេអូ

fields.label: Aborted
fields.default: ការលេងមេឌាត្រូវបានបោះបង់។

fields.label: Network failure
fields.default: បណ្តាញបរាជ័យ

fields.label: Cannot decode video source
fields.default: មិនអាចបម្លែងមេឌាបាន

fields.label: Format not supported
fields.default: ប្រភេទវីដេអូមិនត្រូវបានគាំទ្រ

fields.label: Media encrypted
fields.default: មេឌាត្រូវបានអ៊ីនគ្រីប

fields.label: Unknown error
fields.default: មិនដឹងមានបញ្ហាអី

fields.label: Invalid YouTube ID
fields.default: ID យូធូបមិនត្រឹមត្រូវ។

fields.label: Unknown YouTube ID
fields.default: រកមិនឃើញវីដេអូដែលត្រូវ ID ដែលបានបញ្ចូល។

fields.label: Restricted YouTube video
fields.default: ម្ចាស់វីដេអូនេះមិនអនុញ្ញាតឲ្យគេបង្កប់វីដេអូនេះក្នុងវេបសាយក្រៅពី YouTube ទេ។

fields.label: Type kind, refer to HTML living standard
Source language, must be defined for subtitles
fields.description: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If the kind attribute is set to subtitles, then srclang must be defined.
